hints.content: On the number line, we start at $243$ and move **right** $\purpleE{400}$, then $\blueE{10}$, and finally $\maroonE2$ more.

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, tick marks labeled 243, 643, 653, and 655. An arrow labeled plus 400 is above the number line beginning at 243 and ending at 643. An arrow labeled plus 10 is above the number line beginning at 643 and ending at 653. An arrow labeled plus 2 is above the number line beginning at 653 and ending at 655.
